name: Check Celestial Energy
description: Concentrate on your Star Pearl to check the amount of Celestial Energy stored inside.

name: Meditate
description: Focus your mind on gathering Celestial Energy from the hevens and stars above. A focused mind and a clear view of stars will yield the best results.

name: Purify
description: Purify the area around yourself cleansing all corpses in the process. Grants a small amount of Celestial Energy for every purified corpse.
message: You begin purifying the area around yourself.

name: Rite of Faith
description: When another individual places their trust in you. The essence of that faith can be harnessed and converted into Celestial Energy using this spell. The more trust they place in you the more energy you reap.

name: Fox Fire Bolt
description: Cast a bolt of purifying Fox fire at the target. Costs 100 Celestial Energy and deals 200 Heat damage.

name: Fox Fire Bolt Damage
description: Part of the Fox Fire Bolt Spell. If you have this you probably debuged it.
